p: Puma samples were collected as part of ongoing studies at Colorado Parks and Wildlife (CPW) between 2005 and 2014, and provided to Colorado State University (CSU) for diagnostic evaluation. Domestic cat samples were collected by collaborating shelters and sent to CSU during the same period. Blood samples from these studies have been archived and reused for many unique analyses. CSU and CPW Institutional Animal Care and Use Committees reviewed and approved this work prior to initiation (CSU IACUC protocol 05-061A).
